name: Ext_R4B_ResearchStudy_principalInvestigator
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.ResearchStudy.principalInvestigator for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ResearchStudy.principalInvestigator from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchStudy|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Researcher who oversees multiple aspects of the study
element.definition: A researcher in a study who oversees multiple aspects of the study, such as concept development, protocol writing, protocol submission for IRB approval, participant recruitment, informed consent, data collection, analysis, interpretation and presentation.
element.comment: `ResearchStudy.principalInvestigator` has no related element in R5:ResearchStudy
